a-dropdown-button/disabled.description: whether the dropdown menu is disabled

a-dropdown-button/placement.description: placement of pop menu: bottomLeft bottomCenter bottomRight topLeft topCenter topRight

a-dropdown-button/size.description: size of the button, the same as Button

a-dropdown-button/trigger.description: the trigger mode which executes the drop-down action

a-dropdown-button/type.description: type of the button, the same as Button

a-dropdown-button/visible.description: whether the dropdown menu is visible
